mapper.select: SELECT n.seq_notice AS seqNotice, n.seq_doctor AS seqDoctor, n.seq_animal_hospital AS seqAnimalHospital, n.notice_subject AS noticeSubject, n.notice_content AS noticeContent, date_format(n.notice_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeWriteDate, a.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, date_format(n.notice_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeUpdateDate from notice AS n join animalhospital AS a ON n.seq_animal_hospital = a.seq_animal_hospital join doctor AS d on n.seq_doctor = d.seq_doctor order by noticeUpdateDate DESC
